elements.text:
You are at a quiet restaurant with a lot of your family members for dinner. While taking a drink of your water, you accidently drop the glass on the floor and it shatters.

Here are some feelings that might happen in the moment:

text: I'm embarrassed that I dropped the glass, but know that people drop things all of the time.
I'm happy that the waiter doesn't seem to mind that much.
I have a knot in my stomach after the whole restaurant looked at me.
I feel bad, but remind myself that I'll forget about this in a few days.
